amendment.description: To increase benefits for disabled U.S. veterans and provide a fair benefit to World War II Filipino veterans for their service to the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4572 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 56. Record Vote Number: 111.

action.text: Amendment SA 4572 proposed by Senator Burr. (consideration: CR S3297; text: CR S3297) To increase benefits for disabled U.S. veterans and provide a fair benefit to World War II Filipino veterans for their service to the United States.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4572 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 56. Record Vote Number: 111.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4572 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 56. Record Vote Number: 111.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4572 proposed by Senator Burr.
